trans-unit.source: Provides a constructor-like means of calling <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.ExpressionBuilder.DbExpressionBuilder.NewRow*>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um construtor semelhante de chamar <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.ExpressionBuilder.DbExpressionBuilder.NewRow*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.ExpressionBuilder.DbExpressionBuilder.NewRow*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.ExpressionBuilder.Row"></xref> class with the specified first column value and optional successive column values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.ExpressionBuilder.Row"> </xref> classe com o valor da primeira coluna e valores de coluna sucessivas opcional.

trans-unit.source: A key-value pair that provides the first column in the new row instance.
trans-unit.target: Um par chave-valor que fornece a primeira coluna na nova instância de linha.

trans-unit.source: A key-value pairs that provide any subsequent columns in the new row instance.
trans-unit.target: Pares de chave-valor que fornecem todas as colunas subsequentes na nova instância de linha.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression"></xref> that constructs a new row based on the columns contained in this Row instance.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression"> </xref> que constrói uma nova linha com base nas colunas contidas nesta instância de linha.

trans-unit.source: A new DbNewInstanceExpression that constructs a row with the same column names and DbExpression values as this Row instance.
trans-unit.target: Um novo DbNewInstanceExpression que constrói uma linha com os mesmos nomes de coluna e valores de DbExpression que esta instância de linha.
